description: Returns information for Student Audiences specified in the request. If the request                  does not specify a Student Audience, this operation returns information for all Student                  Audiences.
Creates a new Engagement Record or one of its subclasses(or updates an existing Student                  Grading Scheme) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Student Audience (or updates an existing Student Audience) with the                  information supplied in the request.
Creates a student note or updates the ID of the Student Note Reference.
